United States Court of Appeals
                For the First Circuit

Nos. 98-1412
98-1819

                     UNITED STATES,

                       Appellee,

                           v.

                   ROBERT A. VIGEANT,

                 Defendant, Appellant.

                     ERRATA SHEET

The opinion of this Court issued on May 14, 1999 is amended
as follows:

Page 19, footnote 9, line 3 - "note 3" should read "note 4"
